conversations.conversation: I am the proud owner of a new Business. Going slow but getting there. I just started this business on the 1st April 2011 and would like to invite you all to visit my website at www.thecarsite.co.za and support me in my endeavour. On this site you can search for your car you want to buy or sell your car. The best service and prices guarenteed. Hope to see some support and make lots of new friends at pan.net Thank you.
